reasoning: Form validation is a well-understood pattern requiring 2-4 files (form component, validation logic, error display). Single service, no external integrations, but requires thoughtful implementation to avoid breaking existing form functionality.

scope.notes: Primary target is MaterialsPage.tsx. Will likely create validation utilities/hooks and possibly error display components for clean code organization.

integrations.notes: May add a validation library (yup, zod, react-hook-form) or implement custom validation. Either approach is well-documented and commonly used in React applications.
